data: Rue Guénégaud | quays | Arcade of the Pont Neuf | Rue Mazarine | Rue de Seine
At the end of the Rue Guénégaud, coming from the quays, you find the Arcade of the Pont Neuf, a sort of narrow, dark corridor running from the Rue Mazarine to the Rue de Seine.
